title: Looking for someone to 1v1 me
body: Currently S5, just wanted to learn and hone my mechanics, preferrably someone that can beat my ass so I can pick up on what I did wrong in each fight. Cheers :)

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} added, not on super often but got the next couple of days off should know a thing or two, will check before i head into ranked whenever i'm on
